Activities regarding when setting up a MCP server from TenX
1. I started the challenge from the "Tenx MCP Analysis & IDE Connection Guide" file.
2. After setting up the MCP server with vscode successfully, I continued to setting up cursor from installation to configuration without knowing only one IDE was required as a result wasting time.
3. Proceeded to MCP setup challenge - First challenge file
4. Troubleshoot Git connection issues and successfully connected the local repo to GitHub.
5. Investigated how changing the rules to the copilot-instructions.md file affects the suggestions, coding formatting and response of the copilot agent.
6. Pushed the contents of the rules and activity_report.md files to the github repo.
7. Proceeded to the TRP1 - AI-Content Generation Challenge - Second challenge.
